rules_text:
Menace, haste
Whenever a creature you control with mana value 1 enters, it gains menace and haste until end of turn.
{2}{G}{W}: Search your library for a creature card with mana value 1, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:
ARTed

Rank_3
With this card included suddenly we have to evaluate one drops slightly differently. Watch out for easy combos, keep tabs on other incentives, make sure the numbers are there. But I think potential is there
